title: Machine Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Gamification Workshop for Self-Management of Inflammatory Bowel Disease (IBD)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding fundamental IBD symptoms and treatment concepts
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain IBD symptom tracking and dietary management methods with 80% accuracy
Participants can set and execute three or more daily self-management goals using a gamification app
Based on app usage records for two weeks post-education, learners evaluate self-management sustainability at ≥70%

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
